info.readme:
************************************* ********** ATTENTION ********** ************************************* This version requires that the SQL User is "db_owner" (or has the correct privileges to manage foreign keys) because the SQL scripts will modify the "FK_cmsPreviewXml_cmsContentVersion" constraint of the table "cmsPreviewXml" to enable the "ON CASCADE DELETE" rule. ************************************** **************************************
This package adds a tree node to the developer section with the following tools: - Umbraco logs manager N.B.: in order to improve the performance of the log viewer, you can add SQL indexes to the coloumns DateStamp, UserId and LogHeader of umbracoLog table. - Media folder cleanup N.B.: in the current release this feature works only with "UploadAllowDirectories" set to "true". - Delete users - Version manager
Versions History: v4.5.0.1 - Fixed issue for no removing version in 4.5 version (*** db_owner required ***) v4.5.0.0 - Version compatible with Umbraco v4.5 v1.1.0.0 - Version compatible with Umbraco v4.0 - Logs manager: - Added filtering capabilities on NodeId - Improved date filter: now you can select a range between two dates - Media folder cleanup: - Various fixes in the search algorithm. - Delete users: - Changed sort order and display of disabled users to match standard Umbraco behaviour - Version manager: - Added filtering capabilities on NodeId - Improved date filter: now you can select a range between two dates - Added paging - Rewritten code with direct access to DB to make performance way faster v1.0.0.0 - Initial release

Actions.Action: ALTER TABLE cmsPreviewXml DROP CONSTRAINT FK_cmsPreviewXml_cmsContentVersion;
ALTER TABLE cmsPreviewXml ADD CONSTRAINT FK_cmsPreviewXml_cmsContentVersion FOREIGN KEY (versionId) REFERENCES cmsContentVersion (VersionId) ON DELETE CASCADE;
